A full-vertical, cyberpunk-inspired street scene in a rainy city, viewed from a slightly elevated perspective looking down the street. The dominant colors are vibrant neon purples, pinks, and blues, contrasting with the dark, wet surfaces and muted grays of the buildings.

In the foreground, a person in a transparent or translucent rain slicker walks away from the viewer, holding a black umbrella. The wet ground reflects the neon lights vividly, creating streaks and splashes of color. Behind them, several more people with umbrellas are also walking away, receding into the distance.

The street is lined with tall, dark buildings featuring visible pipes and conduits, illuminated by neon signs that prominently display the word "PIXEL" in a glowing, stylized font. Many of these signs are rectangular or billboard-like, some are vertical, extending high up the buildings. Streetlights with warm, circular glows cast pools of light on the wet pavement.

In the mid-ground, a sleek, futuristic black motorcycle hovers in the air, angled slightly towards the upper right. Red laser-like lines or light trails emanate from the left side of the image, leading towards the motorcycle and suggesting speed or movement.

In the background, towering skyscrapers pierce the cloudy, rainy sky. These buildings are also subtly lit with internal lights and reflections, adding to the urban density. The rain is visible as fine streaks across the entire image, adding to the atmosphere. The overall mood is futuristic, melancholic, and visually striking. The composition draws the eye down the street and up towards the floating motorcycle and high-rise buildings.
